title: Colorado
prompt: A weathered pickup truck parked on a high plains county road at golden hour, mountains distant on the horizon, with a rural health clinic visible across empty acreageâ€”capture the truck's side mirror and dusty dashboard detail, the long shadows cast by sparse utility poles, and the vastness of land between here and care. Use warm, desaturated tones and documentary-style framing that conveys both isolation and resilience, with no people visible, only the evidence of rural life and the geography that defines access.
